name: FreeCodeCamp - base16 Atelier Forest Dark theme
description: A dark theme for FreeCodeCamp, based on Atelier Forest Dark (base16) by Chris Kempton.
additional_info: v1.02 (30 March 2016) - Fixed mainpage buttons - Fixed landing-page element colors - Initial work on theming Gitter popout chat (not yet implemented) v1.01 (29 March 2016) - Fixed submit button background v1.00 (29 March 2016) - Initial release
